events.title: Bugonia - Greek Premiere
events.description: Opening night of the 31st Athens International Film Festival featuring the Greek premiere of Yorgos Lanthimos' latest film 'Bugonia' starring Emma Stone and Jesse Plemons

events.title: Robbie Williams Concert
events.description: British pop icon Robbie Williams performs at the historic Panathenaic Stadium

events.title: Stanley Whitney: Return to the Garden
events.description: Solo exhibition by American abstract painter Stanley Whitney featuring colorful grid paintings. Exhibition runs until January 17, 2026

events.title: OCEAN with David Attenborough
events.venue: Megaron Athens Concert Hall - Alexandra Trianti Hall
events.description: Special screening of ocean documentary featuring David Attenborough's narration and Revive Our Ocean Greece initiative

events.title: Vegan Life Festival Athens 2025
events.description: Greece's biggest vegan event returns for its ninth edition under the theme 'For Earth's Sake' with plant-based food, talks, and workshops. Runs October 4-5

events.title: Athenogates Group Art Exhibition
events.description: Opening night of group art exhibition featuring multiple contemporary artists. Exhibition runs through November

events.title: Mogwai Live
events.description: Scottish post-rock legends Mogwai perform their atmospheric instrumental music

events.title: Onassis Stegi Street Party 2025
events.description: 15th anniversary celebration with street party featuring Daniel Avery and JG Wilkes (Optimo) B2B set, plus family activities by Bobos Arts Festival

events.title: Hugo Kant
events.description: French jazz pianist and electronic music producer Hugo Kant performs live

events.title: Marc Almond
events.description: Legendary British synth-pop icon Marc Almond performs exclusive show. Also performing October 17

events.title: Public Service Broadcasting
events.description: British indie band performs documentary samples, cinematic soundscapes, and indie electronica

events.title: Hotel Experience 2025
events.description: Technopolis transforms into hospitality showcase with speakers from high-end hotels, resorts, architects, and designers. Runs October 18-19

events.title: Dub FX and Mr. Woodnote
events.description: Australian live-looping artist Dub FX performs with British reggae artist Mr. Woodnote

events.title: Red Snapper
events.description: British trio performs acid jazz, trip-hop, and psychedelic surf music

events.title: Juergen Teller: you are invited
events.description: Inaugural exhibition at new Onassis Ready space featuring photographer Juergen Teller's most expansive solo presentation in Greece. Runs until December 30

events.title: Sunn O)))
events.description: American experimental drone metal duo performs immersive live show

events.title: Athens International Music Festival 2025
events.description: Multi-day classical music festival featuring international performers. Festival runs October 21-25

events.title: Thanos Stavridis Live
events.description: Greek jazz musician performs at Athens' most intimate jazz venue

events.title: Barcelona Gipsy Balkan Orchestra
events.description: Performance blending Balkan folk, rebetiko, jazz, klezmer, and Mediterranean rhythms

events.title: Brian Jackson Jacaranda
events.description: American jazz and soul legend Brian Jackson performs on Halloween night
